# Empathy
The ability to read and implant emotions in others' minds.
# Rank 0 / 0 Mana - Detect Emotions
# Rank 1 / 1 Mana - Attraction/Repulsion - Emotion: Fear - Emotion: Rage - (remove emotional effect)
# Rank 2 / 2 Mana - Emotion: Calm (target becomes docile) - Emotion: Love
# Other Modifiers - For +1 mana, convert from target into burst 1 (stackable)
article.bodyHtml:
Empathy

The ability to read and implant emotions in others' minds.

Rank 0 / 0 Mana

  • Detect Emotions

Rank 1 / 1 Mana

  • Attraction/Repulsion
  • Emotion: Fear
  • Emotion: Rage
  • (remove emotional effect)

Rank 2 / 2 Mana

  • Emotion: Calm (target becomes docile)
  • Emotion: Love

Other Modifiers

  • For +1 mana, convert from target into burst 1 (stackable)
